summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue South from Hanford Street to Spokane Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 20435, creating Local Improvement District No. 2030 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
